snippet.title: GreedFall 2 | The Uprooting Trailer
snippet.description:
GreedFall makes its highly anticipated return to the spotlight with the captivating Uprooting Trailer.
 
Immerse yourself in the world of GreedFall and play as a native from Teer Fradee who has endured the violence and persecution inflicted upon their people.
 
Explore the vast universe that GreedFall 2 has to offer as you set foot on the Old Continent to discover many regions you haven’t seen before.

Early Access on Steam this summer 2024 : https://nacon.me/GF2Steam

Crown Wars will be available on Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 5 and PC.
